Text: This is a great fuckin idea!Why hasn't anybody done this?!Well,i collect all image comics every week,so thanks so much for this.i love you dude (no homo)
Yep,great idea,could see this becoming very popular,can't believe nobody ( me included ) thought about this before.Great work STF.
sweet!! way to get your own weekly thingy STF

I just signed up to personally thank YOU for all your uploads! I buy all (well most) of the issues but they only get shipped to me every 2 weeks so it's great to read these before the floppies arrive. O and great idea to post them all in one dl. Thanks again!
YES. Thank You - Finally some IMAGE love :D When people ask Marvel or DC - I say Image!

Fantastic idea - thank you, STFMaryville.  Hopefully, this will inspire others to break out their work into segments, thus reducing the urge to download everything under the sun when you're looking for only a fraction of it.  No snark intended here - this is an efficient and timely concept.

happy to hear it's a good idea.

image puts out some of my old favorites (savage dragon, twd) and great newer titles (chew, saga, revival, jupiter's legacy).

it isn't very hard to compile those from 0-day posts and add in all the lesser-known books each thursday or friday.

may god have mercy on my soul, i'll even include youngblood (if rob ever gets off his ass and publishes another issue)!
This is a great idea STFmaryville. It should be easier to collect my Image comics now. Thanks a bunch.
GREAT!! Can you also upload SPAWN :))

if you mean this week, no because it didn't come out. if you mean when it does come out, yes but not if it isn't scanned before i compile the week! in that case it will be included whenever i get it, obviously.
STFmaryville: Props on a great new collection!
Looks like my last Thank you got dropped so thank you again dude this is awesome
